message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take the majority, but you'll get a decent chunk.  Think about the future rounds - the money will be worth less, so it's best to get something now.
I propose we split the money evenly, considering the decreasing value of money in future rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still believe I should get a larger share, as my losses from inflation are greater than yours. Let's meet in the middle.
